a.title: Congrats to our New Board Certified Teachers!

li.a: Congrats to our New Board Certified Teachers!

nav.div: Fife Public Schools » News » What's New » COVID-19 Update

br.br:
Dear Families -
We thank you for your continued support and partnership during this unprecedented time. During this first month of traditional school closure we've provided approximately 55,600 meals, childcare is in place for our first responders, and continuous learning has started for all of our students. Now we'd like the opportunity to pause and get some input from the families we serve.
We’ve created a Thoughtexchange to see what else you might need, what questions you have, or any other thoughts you might like to share with us during this time. Simply click this link to begin!
Thoughtexchange gives you the opportunity to share your own thoughts and/or let us know if the thoughts of others resonate with you. You'll be asked to respond to one open-ended question, consider and assign stars to some of the ideas shared by others (20 to 30 is ideal), and learn what's important to the group.
Your thoughts and stars are confidential. You can come back as often as you'd like to participate and, in fact, we ask that you do come back to star some of the new ideas shared since you first participated.
This exchange is now open and will close next Friday morning, April 24, at 10 AM.
We’ll use your responses to help us know what’s working, what tweaks might be needed, and how we continue to best serve our families.
Thank you for your patience as we continue to build the plane while flying! TOGETHER we are Fife!
Kevin
Kevin Alfano
Superintendent
Fife Public Schools
